content: If you believe loyalty matters (and it does), well motivated and treated employees will always be more productive. Contracting is great for short term, projects but when long term productivity is needed employment is always better. Long term contracting strategies have two fatal flaws most ignore: Contractors are independent business people and therefore will always have ‘one foot out the door' as, for personal survival, the need to be looking for the next thing. And, they will find it!Companies will always pay more for a contractor than an employee and for that excess cost, all expertise and business insights can be quickly lost due the the transient ‘risk.
